Pong Game https://github.com/damola600/p: Created a 2 player game using the turtle module in Python.
Used OOP concepts such as inheritance, classes, and polymorphism.

Spotify Playlist https://github.com/damo: Used BeautifulSoup library to scrape the Billboard website to get the top 100 songs.
Used the Spotify library to create a playlist and add the songs to the playlist.
Used a dotenv file to keep sensitive information like the client_id and the client_secret.

Amazon Price Tracker https://github.com/: The code checks if the price of SodaStream on Amazon has reached a certain price and sends an email notification
Used BeautifulSoup library to scrape the Amazon Website to get the Price of a SodaStream.
Used the SMTP library to send an email of the price alert.
Used a dotenv file to keep sensitive information like the email and the password.

Laboratory Management System https://git: Developed a Desktop Application for a laboratory management system.
Used NodeJs to create the backend for the application
Created a user-friendly UI with WPF.
Used Firebase to store data for the Application.

Cook At Home https://github.com/damola60: Cook At Home is an app built to provide simple recipes that can be made at home
Java was used in building the app and SQL was used for the database
Implemented a clean and intuitive user interface using Material Design.

Laboratory Management Website https://gi: Developed a full-featured laboratory management website using React.
Designed a responsive UI using Bootstrap and custom CSS.
Used Firebase to store customer, employee and sample data.
Created Web Server using HTTP module.
Used JSON to handle incoming and outgoing data.
